page.title: 03LIFE AT HORTON SCHOOL
page.content: I do not want Horton School to close because I would lose my friends. My other school was much bigger and the Infants and Juniors were split up. In the morning,after the register, we go to Assembly and have a story out of the Bible and sing hymns. I think Horton School is good compared with most other schools because of the activities. Behind the school is a hill where people put cows in the Spring. We go for walks to look at interesting things. We have a little bit of garden each where we have planted flowers. Inside we do Maths, English,Reading,Painting,Science and Handwriting.We have very good trips and learn to play brass instruments and the recorder. We also have a B.B.C.computer and do woodwork.I can't see just because it is small why anyone should want to close it down.
